name: Fundy's Among Us Tetris
description:
I was inspired by Fundy's YouTube Video "So I coded Tetris in Minecraft..."so I decided to make his version as a playable game. He used some ... unique ... pieces in his game.

It's actually a lot of fun to play. You can be doing real well then suddenly one of Fundy's large Tetris pieces screws you over.

Let me know your high score in the comments. Video proof or it didn't happen (haha).

Features
  • Regular Tetris but with a twist!
    • or maybe it's just a big hinderance...

Controls:

FunctionKeyboardMove Left/RightLeft/Right Arrow keysHard dropUp Arrow keyFaster dropDown Arrow keyRotate counter clockwiseZRotate clockwiseXRestart LevelEnter
